extension_description.message: Displays user reputation statistics on Steam profile pages.
extension_description.description: A brief description of what the extension does.

badge_title.description: The title of the badge displayed on the Steam profile.

badge_reputation.description: The text displayed on the badge showing the user's reputation.

badge_loading.description: Text displayed while the reputation data is being fetched.

badge_error.description: Text displayed when there is an error fetching the reputation data.
